derivation: apparently a patronymic from an unused name (apparently passive participle of H2492 (חָלַם)); dreamed;
outline:
Nehelamite = "he of the dream"
  1. the designation of a false prophet Shemaiah taken into captivity to Babylon; name is formed from his native place or his progenitor
strongs_def: a Nechelamite, or descendant of Nechlam
